features.name: Unholy Resistance
entries: You gain resistance to necrotic damage.
You become immune to spells and effects that reduce your hit point maximum or ability scores.

features.name: Improved Animation
entries: When you cast <spell animate dead>, you can target one additional corpse or pile of bones to create an extra skeleton or zombie.
This does not apply when using Animate Major Undead.
Whenever you create an Undead with a Necromancy spell, you can grant it the following benefits:

items: HP maximum increased by your Charisma modifier.
Uses your spell attack modifier for its attack rolls.
Is immune to effects that reduce HP maximum or ability scores.

features.name: Aura of Resolve
entries: Undead under your control within 30 ft gain the following:

items: Immunity to being Turned or Frightened.
Their attacks count as magical for overcoming resistances/immunities.
They gain a bonus to saving throws equal to your Charisma modifier.

features.name: Lord of the Undead
entries: When casting <spell animate dead>, you can raise a Ghoul instead of a Zombie, or a Toxotai instead of a Skeleton.
Undertakers are necromancers who focus on raising and improving Undead. They wield larger undead armies than most, and specialize in enhancing their durability and strength.

entries.name: Undertaker
entries: Undertakers are necromancers who focus on raising and improving Undead. They wield larger undead armies than most, and specialize in enhancing their durability and strength.
